nodes.text: Vil was a male police officer who served with the Coruscant Security Force on the planet of Coruscant. When Order 66 was issued—condemning all Jedi as traitors to the Galactic Republic—Vil was piloting a CSF assault ship and flying patrol with a CSF akk dog handler and Republic Commandos Darman and Niner. With some disbelief, Vil informed the commandos and his partner of the comm traffic on the military activity at the Jedi Temple. He landed the assault ship they were in, on a platform at the request of the commandos, who disembarked to contact their sergeant, Kal Skirata.
Vil first appeared in Order 66: A Republic Commando Novel, a 2008 novel written by Karen Traviss.
